about_the_game:
Join the ranks of the mightiest brawlers in this crazy fighting tournament - Mask of Fury! Get in on the action with intense fights, spectacular combos, and a variety of locations.

Mask of Fury is an adrenaline-packed party brawler based on ragdoll physics. There are several single and multiplayer game modes to choose from, allowing you and your friends to challenge yourselves and have a great time together! The game supports 1-4 players.



  • Easy to learn, Hard to master
Get into battle from the very first second of the game. And if you want to become the best of the best, master combinations of moves and develop your own winning tactics in the Arena!

  • 8 unique locations
Fight all over the world (and even in space!) in a variety of arenas filled with traps and destructible objects.

  • 8 crazy characters
Grab your favorite fighter and jump into the Arena: each of them has their own backstory and Super Attack.

  • Not everything is solved with fists
Use melee weapons and boosters to turn the tides of battle in your favor.

  • Multiple Game Modes
Fight your way through 15 brutally challenging missions of the Campaign alone or together with friends. Test your might in Survival and Time Attack modes. And then show who's the boss of this gym in the signature mode of the same name - Mask of Fury!

  • Online and Local Multiplayer
Choose who you want to challenge - real players or AI. Battle online or sitting together on the same couch!
